title: Bitwise AND from 1 to n
statement: You are given an integer n (1 <= n < 10^18). Your task is to compute the result of bitwise AND of all integers from 1 to n, i.e., 1 & 2 & 3 & ... & n.
input_format: The first and only line contains an integer n.
output_format: Print a single integer â€” the result of 1 AND 2 AND ... AND n.
